successes.title: Blue Mountain State: The Movie
successes.description: An epic, outrageous, feature length comedy based on the popular TV series.

Pledges.description: NOTHING... you get nothing. (Except bragging rights that you helped fund the GREATEST MOVIE EVER MADE)
PDF OF THE SHOOTING SCRIPT PLUS A THANK YOU TWEET AND FOLLOW FROM THE OFFICIAL 'BMS: THE MOVIE' TWITTER ACCOUNT.

THE COLLEGE PACKAGE  A BMS shot glass and a BMS pint glass. What more could a college student need? This item is exclusive to backers and WILL be included with all donations at higher price points. See our FAQ for more details.  
You'll also receive a PDF of the script, a tweet/follow from the official BMS:The Movie twitter, and nothing.
MASCOT'S INFAMOUS "JERKING OFF/NOT JERKING OFF" DOORKNOB SIGN.
This item is exclusive to backers.
You'll also receive a PDF of the script, a tweet/follow from the official BMS:The Movie twitter, and nothing.

LIMITED EDITION POSTER OF YOUR CHOICE (A LA CARTE) Get one poster or collect all 7!  See our FAQ for poster sizes. If you'd like your poster signed, add $70.  *NOTE: This is a stand alone item and is NOT included with any other reward tier. Collect them all!

BMS TANK TOPS (A LA CARTE) Now every sloot can stay cool this summer with a high quality BMS: The Movie tank top! *NOTE: This is a stand alone item and is NOT included with any other reward tier. Collect them all!

Estimated delivery: Aug 2014
Add $5 USD to ship outside the US
DIGITAL DOWNLOAD OF THE MOVIE available within a few days of the movie's release.
You'll also receive Mascot's doorknob sign, a PDF of the script, a tweet/follow from the official BMS:The Movie twitter, and nothing.
HIGH QUALITY BMS T-SHIRT. These shirts are exclusive to backers. Several awesome designs to choose from. (See FAQ section if interested in purchasing an addition shirt design for $35)
You'll also receive a digital download of the movie, Mascot's doorknob sign, a PDF of the script, a tweet/follow from the official BMS:The Movie twitter, and nothing.

PORTABLE BMS BEER PONG TRIANGLES (A LA CARTE) Now EVERY table can become a beer pong table! This high quality solid wood triangle will make setting up for your next beer pong tourney a snap. Includes two triangles. *NOTE: This is a stand alone item and is NOT included with any other reward tier. Makes a great gift!

PERSONALIZED SIX SECOND VINE VIDEO FROM CAST MEMBER OF YOUR CHOICE. (Denise Richards excluded) We'll say whatever you want as long as it won't get us arrested.
You'll also receive a T-shirt, a digital download of the movie, Mascot's doorknob sign, a PDF of the script, a tweet/follow from the official BMS:The Movie twitter, and nothing.

"BMS: THE MOVIE" POSTER SIGNED BY ENTIRE CAST. (Denise Richards excluded) Two designs to choose from, both exclusive to our backers. Of course, if you'd rather the poster without signatures, we won't cry about it.
You'll also receive a personalized Vine, a T-shirt, a digital download of the movie, Mascot's doorknob sign, a PDF of the script, a tweet/follow from the official BMS:The Movie twitter, and nothing.

BECOME IMMORTALIZED WITH A "SPECIAL THANKS" IN THE MOVIE CREDITS. Your name will appear on screen in the ending credits of the movie.
You'll also receive an autographed poster, a personalized Vine, a T-shirt, a digital download of the movie, Mascot's doorknob sign, a PDF of the script, a tweet/follow from the official BMS:The Movie twitter, and nothing.

THE DENISE RICHARDS PACKAGE. Receive an exclusive photo personalized to you and autographed by Denise Richards! As an added bonus, Denise will also sign your movie poster.
You'll also receive a "Special Thanks", an autographed poster, a personalized Vine, a T-shirt, a digital download of the movie, Mascot's doorknob sign, a PDF of the script, a tweet/follow from the official BMS:The Movie twitter, and nothing. (*Note: This reward is exclusive to this price point and  NOT included with any other rewards)

PREMIUM QUALITY BMS FOOTBALL JERSEY FEATURING THE NAME AND NUMBER OF YOUR FAVORITE CHARACTER. Choose between Castle, Moran, Tedesco, Randell, Schrab, Summers, even Mascot. As an added bonus, the cast member will autograph your jersey. (If you'd rather not have your jersey autographed, that's fine too.)
You'll also receive a "Special Thanks", an autographed poster, a personalized Vine, a T-shirt, a digital download of the movie, Mascot's doorknob sign, a PDF of the script, a tweet/follow from the official BMS:The Movie twitter, and nothing.

TWO TICKETS TO THE WORLD PREMIERE IN LOS ANGELES PLUS ACCESS TO EXCLUSIVE AFTER PARTY WITH CAST AND CREATORS. (*Note: travel and lodging NOT included for domestic or International backers)
You'll also receive a signed BMS Jersey, a "Special Thanks", an autographed poster, a personalized Vine, a T-shirt, a digital download of the movie, Mascot's doorknob sign, a PDF of the script, a tweet/follow from the official BMS:The Movie twitter, and nothing.

TWO TICKETS TO THE PREMIERE IN NEW YORK CITY PLUS ACCESS TO EXCLUSIVE AFTER PARTY WITH CAST AND CREATORS. (*Note: travel and lodging NOT included for domestic or International backers) You'll also receive a signed BMS Jersey, a "Special Thanks", an autographed poster, a personalized Vine, a T-shirt, a digital download of the movie, Mascot's doorknob sign, a PDF of the script, a tweet/follow from the official BMS:The Movie twitter, and nothing.

TWO TICKETS TO ALAN RITCHSON'S FRIENDS AND FAMILY PREMIERE IN DESTIN, FLORIDA. PLUS ACCESS TO EXCLUSIVE AFTER PARTY WITH CAST AND CREATORS. (*Note: travel and lodging NOT included for domestic or International backers) You'll also receive a signed BMS Jersey, a "Special Thanks", an autographed poster, a personalized Vine, a T-shirt, a digital download of the movie, Mascot's doorknob sign, a PDF of the script, a tweet/follow from the official BMS:The Movie twitter, and nothing.

HANG OUT ON SET WITH THE CAST AND CREW. You, plus a friend, will spend a day on set as our personal guests. We will most likely be shooting in Montreal, QC in July/August of this year. (*Note: Travel and lodging is NOT included for domestic or International backers. Also, clearing Canadian immigration and customs is your responsibility if traveling)
You'll also receive a signed BMS Jersey, a "Special Thanks", an autographed poster, a personalized Vine, a T-shirt, a digital download of the movie, Mascot's doorknob sign, a PDF of the script, a tweet/follow from the official BMS:The Movie twitter, and nothing.

GET YOURSELF A JOCKSTRAP AND A COOKIE... IT'S A CHOCOLATE COOKIE RACE!!! Hang out with the cast and crew on set for a day, and for only $1 more race Thad, Alex, and Sammy in a chocolate cookie race. Same rules apply:  loser has to eat his cookie (and Thad reeeally wants to lose). As an added bonus, we'll also film the race for you so you can show it to your mom and dad. We will most likely be shooting in Montreal, QC in July/August of this year. (*Note: Travel and lodging is NOT included for domestic or international backers. Also, clearing Canadian immigration and customs is your responsibility if traveling) You’ll also receive a signed BMS Jersey, A “Special Thanks”, an autographed poster, a personalized Vine, a T-shirt, a digital download of the movie, Mascot’s doorknob sign, the college package, a PDF of the script, and a tweet/follow from the official BMS: The Movie twitter.

CUSTOM BMS: THE MOVIE BEER PONG TABLE! Did you know Thad's favorite class was wood shop!? Well let Thad upgrade your frat or man cave with this beautiful custom beer pong table built by Thad (Alan Ritchson) all by himself with no help while our friends at C5 Beer Pong watch.  This table with hidden cup and ball storage, orange L.E.D. lights, blue powder coated legs and BMS: The Movie logo will be all the rage at your next party, and a gorgeous addition to any room when the lights are on.  You’ll also receive a set visit, signed BMS jersey, A “Special Thanks”, an autographed poster, a personalized vine, a T-shirt, a digital download of the movie, Mascot’s doorknob sign, the party pack, a PDF of the script, a tweet/follow from the official BMS the movie twitter, and nothing. (*Note: Travel and lodging is NOT included for domestic or international backers. Also, clearing Canadian immigration and customs is your responsibility if traveling.)

BE AN EXTRA IN THE MOVIE. Party in the Goat House for a day with the cast and crew. We’ll do our best to feature our Kickstarter extras in the scenes, but we can’t promise every extra will make the final cut. If for some reason you don't make the cut, we'll send you a digital copy of your deleted scene. 
We will most likely be shooting in Montreal, QC in July/August of this year and will do our best to accommodate our Kickstarter extras' scheduling needs. (*Note: Travel and lodging is NOT included for domestic or International backers. Also, clearing Canadian immigration and customs is your responsibility if traveling) You'll also receive a signed BMS Jersey, a "Special Thanks", an autographed poster, a personalized Vine, a T-shirt, a digital download of the movie, Mascot's doorknob sign, a PDF of the script, a tweet/follow from the official BMS:The Movie twitter, and nothing.

BE AN EXTRA PLUS ONE. You and a friend will party in the Goat House for a day with the cast and crew. We’ll do our best to feature our Kickstarter extras in the scenes, but we can’t promise every extra will make the final cut. If for some reason you don't make the cut, we'll send you a digital copy of your deleted scene. We will most likely be shooting in Montreal, QC in July/August of this year and will do our best to accommodate our Kickstarter extras' scheduling needs. (*Note: Travel and lodging is NOT included for domestic or International backers. Also, clearing Canadian immigration and customs is your responsibility if traveling) You'll also receive a signed BMS Jersey, a "Special Thanks", an autographed poster, a personalized Vine, a T-shirt, a digital download of the movie, Mascot's doorknob sign, a PDF of the script, a tweet/follow from the official BMS:The Movie twitter, and nothing.

BE AND EXTRA PLUS ONE AND ALSO RECEIVE TWO TICKETS TO THE WORLD PREMIERE IN LOS ANGELES PLUS ACCESS TO EXCLUSIVE AFTER PARTY WITH CAST AND CREATORS. You and a friend will party in the Goat House for a day with the cast and crew. We’ll do our best to feature our Kickstarter extras in the scenes, but we can’t promise every extra will make the final cut. If for some reason you don't make the cut, we'll send you a digital copy of your deleted scene. We will most likely be shooting in Montreal, QC in July/August of this year and will do our best to accommodate our Kickstarter extras' scheduling needs. As an added bonus, you and a friend will also be invited to the world premiere in Los Angeles. (*Note: Travel and lodging is NOT included for domestic or International backers. Also, clearing Canadian immigration and customs is your responsibility if traveling) 
You'll also receive a signed BMS Jersey, a "Special Thanks", an autographed poster, a personalized Vine, a T-shirt, a digital download of the movie, Mascot's doorknob sign, a PDF of the script, a tweet/follow from the official BMS:The Movie twitter, and nothing.
